reviews.text:
I made an order on 07.02.24 at 17:32
Order number 9474
When ordering, the operator Iryna is friendly.
The elderly courier called 30 minutes before delivery to clarify where I was. She said the landmark hotel and that you need to drive further to the house. He drove to the hotel and called that he was there. When I started to say that it is necessary to drive further, it is raining and I don't want to get wet. He: "uh.. it's hard to hear you, there's a bad connection, I'm already standing here"
I had to go to the hotel. Question: why call in advance, specify the address, if you have arrived at the wrong place?
Regarding roles. The salmon doesn't taste good, and they regretted it... (in the photo)
Wasabi is also kind of strange, I still have an unpleasant feeling in my mouth.
She did not pay attention to the text at the bottom of the check: "Didn't like it? Scan, and Help us get better" clearly often problems.
But she herself is to blame, she fell for advertising on Instagram.

People, before ordering, READ the reviews!

Ordered delivery at Forest Sushi Boss for the first time. Set philadelphia composition rice cucumbers 3 cm each ... Fish Where are you?
For 600 UAH, you can buy 2 kg of crackers! What it is ? They cheated ... deceived.
I wanted to please myself, thank you, only disappointment. It's terrible ! I also cook this rice for my child. Management, if you are not fired there, you would be criminals. Fines of 622 hryvnias for this, during the war. Fraud!

Do not order here!
We used to have pizza, it was delicious. I saw an ad on Instagram and ordered sushi to try. I ordered at 20.20, it was supposed to be delivered in an hour and a half.
Around 11 p.m., I called myself because there was no delivery and no one called. I was told that the courier will leave soon 🤦‍♀️ We were already going to bed, I asked to cancel the order, but the operator and then the Admin really asked to receive it anyway. As a result, 15 minutes later they brought tasteless rolls with strange gray trimmings, which you cannot call fish🤬 No one even apologized for such a delay, and I am completely silent about the taste (

For the first time, I was so unpleasantly impressed by the sushi. The picture on the website is good, but almost one rice has arrived. First of all, the picture does not correspond to reality, on the website there are a lot of fillings, caviar, everything else, but in fact there is only one rice and cream cheese, secondly, when ordering, 52 pieces were specified. 1.6 kg + roll as a gift, and 44 pieces arrived. About 1 kg in total, it is a pity that after ordering after some time, the description was changed to 44 pcs. 1.4 kg. In a word, FOOLED.
The sushi falls apart, the avocado is dark and not fresh, the shrimp sometimes did not have a pleasant taste at all, as if spoiled was mixed with more or less fresh, the weathered red fish is also not fresh.
There was not enough ginger, I had to buy it separately in the store, 2 pieces of wasabi in general. of 3 pcs. they just threw it in the trash because it was very sour, like it was spoiled, like it was sour.
The worst sushi ever ordered. Very disappointed.

We ordered a set for 600 UAH, called us back 15 minutes later and offered to add double fish to it for 35 UAH.
Below I will attach a photo of the “double fish”
The first impression was ruined by the courier who, when calling, said “Hurt me up,” and when we met, he acted as if it were our fault that she was working as a courier.

When we opened the set at home, we were shocked.
Initially, we thought that this was a set that someone didn’t pick up, and it stood there all day, until the rice was dry, and half of them were already in ruins. Having tried the first roll, I immediately came across a huge bone!!!!!! I will attach a photo below.
In all rolls, the fish is laser cut!!!! I do not recommend this company at all!!!!!! Just awful !!! Horror !!!!!!!!! For 650 UAH we got not fresh rice with cream cheese!!!!!
Whoever finds the fish in the attached photos has excellent eyesight!!!!!
I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!! I just haven’t tried anything worse yet!!! This company needs to be closed!
